subject: Football
Stadiums and Arenas
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The gantlet of abuse continued during halftime of the Jets’ game against the Cleveland Browns on Sunday at Giants Stadium, with hundreds of men chanting obscenities at a handful of women in the crowd.
snippet: The gantlet of abuse continued during halftime of the Jets’ game against the Cleveland Browns on Sunday at Giants Stadium, with hundreds of men chanting obscenities at a handful of women in the crowd.
